codebookDescription: Study Type: Gaining or Sustaining Control; Country wide
codebookValues: Sm1= Sustaining control study (Schistosoma mansoni prevalence during eligibility testing 10-24%)                                                                        Sm2= Gaining control study (Schistosoma mansoni prevalence during eligibility testing ?25%)
notesForOnt: Not clear if Gaining vs. Sustaining control are really design types. For now, issue new placeholder IRI
